Smart Wi-Fi Enabled Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for direct wireless control and smart home integration without requiring additional hubs, e.g. wireless app-controlled dimmers, voice assistant compatible dimmers, WiFi-enabled brightness controls

Smart Hub-Dependent Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that require a separate smart hub or bridge device for connectivity and remote control functionality, e.g. Z-Wave dimmers, hub-dependent smart dimmers, bridge-connected lighting controls

Wall-Mount Slide Control Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches featuring sliding mechanisms for brightness adjustment with toggle on/off functionality, e.g. slide-control dimmers, toggle-slide combination switches, linear slide controls with toggle, universal slide dimmers

Wall-Mount Touch Activated Dimmer Switch.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches operated by touch-sensitive or tap controls rather than mechanical switching mechanisms, e.g. touch-activated dimmers, capacitive touch light controls, tap dimmers, soft tap dimmers

Wall-Mount Digital Display Dimmer Switch.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches featuring digital displays and electronic interfaces for precise brightness control and monitoring, e.g. LCD dimmer controls, digital readout light switches, electronic control dimmers

Wall-Mount Rotary Knob Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches controlled by rotating knobs or dials for manual brightness adjustment, e.g. dial-controlled dimmers, rotary brightness controls, twist dial dimmers

Standard Wall-Mount Dimmer Switches.definition: Traditional wall-mounted dimmer switches designed for basic lighting control without specialized mechanisms or advanced features, e.g. wall-plate dimmers, conventional brightness controls, basic light dimmers

Dual Function Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that control both lighting and fan functions in a single unit, e.g. fan-light combination controls, dual-purpose dimmer switches

Commercial 0-10V Dimmer Switches.definition: Specialized dimmer switches for low voltage lighting systems and commercial applications using 0-10V control signals, e.g. 0-10V dimmers, commercial LED panel controls, ELV dimmers, low voltage compatible dimmers

Wireless Companion Dimmer Switches.definition: Wireless remote controls and companion devices for multi-location dimmer control, e.g. wireless remotes, companion switch accessories, remote dimmers, auxiliary dimmers, magnetic remote dimmers, handheld remote dimmers

Wall-Mount Rocker Paddle Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches with rocker-style paddle controls for light adjustment and brightness control, e.g. rocker dimmers, paddle dimmers, rocker-style brightness controls, decorator rocker dimmers

Wall-Mount Toggle Flip Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed traditional toggle-style dimmer switches with flip or lever controls for basic on/off and dimming functions, e.g. toggle dimmers, flip-style dimmers, toggle brightness controls, lever-style dimmers

Portable Plug-In Dimmer Switches.definition: Portable dimmer controls that connect inline with lamp cords or plug into outlets for table lamps and portable lighting applications, e.g. lamp dimmers, plug-in light controls, portable brightness controls, cord-mounted dimmers

Motion Sensor Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with integrated motion detection for automatic lighting control and occupancy-based brightness adjustment, e.g. occupancy sensor dimmers, motion-activated dimmers, automatic brightness controls

Advanced LED Compatible Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches with advanced control features specifically designed for LED lighting compatibility and multi-location control, e.g. multi-location dimmers, advanced LED dimmers, LED-compatible dimmers, LED+ dimmer switches

Fluorescent Compatible Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches specifically designed for fluorescent and specialty lighting applications with compatible voltage requirements, e.g. fluorescent dimmers, specialty voltage dimmers

Dual Circuit Dimmer Switches.definition: Wall-installed dimmer switches that control two separate lighting circuits simultaneously from a single switch unit, e.g. double dimmers, two-circuit dimmers

Electronic Low Voltage Dimmer Switches.definition: Specialized dimmer switches designed for electronic low voltage lighting systems and transformers, e.g. ELV dimmers, electronic transformer compatible dimmers

USB Powered Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches designed for USB-powered LED strips and low voltage lighting applications, e.g. USB inline dimmers, LED strip controllers, USB-connected brightness controls

Smart WiFi Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with wireless connectivity and smart home integration capabilities, e.g. WiFi-enabled dimmers, Z-Wave dimmers, smart home compatible dimmers

LED Compatible Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches specifically designed for LED and CFL lighting compatibility, e.g. LED-optimized dimmers, CFL compatible dimmers, low voltage LED dimmers

Rotary Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches operated by rotating knobs or dials for brightness control, e.g. knob-style dimmers, dial dimmers, rotary control dimmers

Dual Function Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that combine dimming with additional functions like fan control or multiple load control, e.g. fan and light dimmers, dual dimmer switches, combination control switches

Plug-in Dimmer Switches.definition: Portable dimmer devices that plug into outlets for lamp and appliance control, e.g. plug-in lamp dimmers, outlet dimmers, portable dimming controls

Low Voltage Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches designed for low voltage DC applications and LED strip lighting, e.g. DC dimmers, LED strip controllers, low voltage brightness controllers
